scripts.start: node-sass ./src/editor.scss -o build && node-sass ./src/style.scss -o build && wp-scripts start & node-sass --watch ./src/editor.scss -o build & node-sass --watch ./src/style.scss -o build
scripts.build: wp-scripts build && node-sass ./src/editor.scss -o build && node-sass ./src/style.scss -o build
